mapper.select: SELECT sys_dict_data.id, sys_dict_data.parent_id, sys_dict_data.dict_type_code, sys_dict_data.label, sys_dict_data.value, sys_dict_data.sort, sys_dict_data.tag_style, sys_dict_data.remark FROM sys_dict_type LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data ON sys_dict_type.code = sys_dict_data.dict_type_code WHERE sys_dict_type.code = #{dictTypeCode} AND sys_dict_type.status = '0' AND sys_dict_type.del_flag = '0' AND sys_dict_data.status = '0' AND sys_dict_data.del_flag = '0'
